pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stochastic Collision Risk Model // Collision Risk Models for avian fauna (seabird and migratory birds) at offshore wind farms. The base deterministic model is derived from Band (2012) https://tethys.pnnl.gov/publications/using-collision-risk- model-assess-bird-collision-risks-offshore-wind-farms. This was further expanded on by Masden (2015) doi:10.7489/1659-1 and code used here is heavily derived from this work with input from Dr A. Cook at the British Trust for Ornithology.
